main event: Two glowing crescent-shaped objects were seen in the sky, moving from west to east and then disappearing into the fog.
interesting points: The objects were brighter than a star and larger than the full moon, but not as large.
The objects exhibited sudden, unnatural movements, including hovering, slight drifting, and then rapidly shooting straight up and disappearing.
The witness was with his wife and several other unknown people, and they all saw the objects.
The witness reported the sighting to Lt. R.S. Draper on July 30, 1968.
The witness completed the UFO report questionnaire on July 31, 1968.
witnesses: Witness, wife, and several other people
